data.comment: The match is underway in Braga.
Farense have a goal kick.
In the minute 1, Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Braga.
Free kick for Farense in the half of Braga.
In the minute 4, David Carmo (Braga) has received a first yellow card.
In Braga Farense attack through Ryan Gauld. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braga.
In the minute 5, Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
Wenderson Galeno (Braga) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Antonio Nobre signals a Farense throw-in in Braga's half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Farense.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Braga.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
Farense are coming forward and Ryan Gauld gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Braga to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Can Braga capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Farense's half?
In the minute 13, Braga drives forward and Andre Castro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 14, Antonio Nobre signals a throw-in for Braga, close to Farense's area.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 15, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
In the minute 18, In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Farense at Braga Municipal.
In Braga Braga drive forward through Andre Castro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 19, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Braga.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Farense.
Throw-in for Farense at Braga Municipal.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Paulinho of Braga smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 24, Antonio Nobre signals a Braga throw-in in Farense's half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Antonio Nobre awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
Antonio Nobre awards Farense a goal kick.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Farense are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Braga just outside Farense's area.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 32, In Braga, Bruno Viana (Braga) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braga.
Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Braga to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Fransergio for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Farense at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 36, Antonio Nobre signals a Farense throw-in in Braga's half.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bilel Aouacheria (Farense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Farense.
Farense's Ryan Gauld misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
In the minute 39, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 41, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulinho (Braga) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Farense needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 43, Free kick in a good position for Braga!
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Braga push forward at Braga Municipal and Paulinho gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Farense defence.
In the minute 45, Farense to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Throw-in for Farense at Braga Municipal.
The first-half is over at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Braga Municipal.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 46, Free kick Braga.
Amine Oudrhiri for Farense has been booked by Antonio Nobre and receives a first yellow card.
Bruno Viana (Braga) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Farense have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Farense.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In the minute 49, Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, In Braga, Farense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braga drive into the zone and Iuri Medeiros is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 53, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Braga close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense at Braga Municipal.
Paulinho (Braga) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Farense at Braga Municipal.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Braga will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Farense.
In the minute 58, Can Farense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Fransergio (Braga) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Braga to check on Brian Mansilla, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 60, Farense's Brian Mansilla looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Braga have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Braga.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Braga to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's first substitution at Braga Municipal with Al Musrati replacing Andre Castro.
The home team have replaced Iuri Medeiros with Andre Horta. This is the second substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
In the minute 63, Joao Novais is on a sub for Fransergio for Braga.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Nikola Stojiljkovic of Farense is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 65, Antonio Nobre signals a Braga throw-in in Farense's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Braga.
Antonio Nobre awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Braga's Wenderson Galeno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Antonio Nobre awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Farense in the half of Braga.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Farense.
Ricardo Horta for Braga drives towards goal at Braga Municipal. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Braga.
Ricardo Horta of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
In the minute 73, Farense make their first substitution with Patrick replacing Nikola Stojiljkovic.
The away team replace Bilel Aouacheria with Hugo Seco.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 75, Farense drive upfield and Ryan Gauld gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Braga defender.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Sergio Vieira (Farense) is making a third substitution, with Bura replacing Brian Mansilla.
Braga have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
At Braga Municipal, Joao Novais has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Braga's Paulinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Farense defender.
In the minute 80, Braga are in shooting range from this free kick.
Farense's Claudio Falcao has been booked in Braga.
Nuno Sequeira (Braga) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Braga to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Farense have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Guilherme Schettine is replacing Wenderson Galeno for the home team.
In the minute 86, Rafael Defendi is back on his feet again.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rafael Defendi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Braga take a 1-0 lead thanks to Al Musrati.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Farense.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braga.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Braga.
Goal kick for Farense at Braga Municipal.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Braga. The final score is 1-0.
Farense make their fourth substitution with Lica replacing Amine Oudrhiri.
Madi Queta is replacing Filipe Melo for Farense at Braga Municipal.
Ryan Gauld is booked for the away team.
